sentences.sContent: The playwright does something remarkable in this scene, but without any impression of straining after an effect.
sentences.sContent_eng: The playwright does something remarkable in this scene, but without any impression of straining after an effect.
sentences.sCn: 剧作家在这场中有许多惊人妙笔，但并不给人留下竭力追求表面效果的印象。

sentences.sContent: His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.
sentences.sContent_eng: His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.
sentences.sCn: 他的剧本被翻译成所有主要使用着的语言，并且表演次数远远超过其他任何剧作家。

sentences.sContent: An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.
sentences.sContent_eng: An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.
sentences.sCn: 以前的一个学生时，返回失败后，她的小城镇作为一个剧作家在纽约的一名英语教师的生活被打乱。

remMethod.val: play(戏剧) + wright(制造者) → 剧作家
